thread.title: Omaha Marriott Incentivizes Meeting Planners For Early Event Bookings In First Quarter Of 2016
thread.title_full: Omaha Marriott Incentivizes Meeting Planners For Early Event Bookings In First Quarter Of 2016 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Omaha Marriott Incentivizes Meeting Planners For Early Event Bookings In First Quarter Of 2016
text:
Omaha Marriott
Omaha hotel offers special deal with perks based on number of room nights reserved
OMAHA, Neb. , Oct. 5, It's time to start planning for productivity in 2016, and Omaha Marriott is making it affordable and comfortable for meeting organizers looking for a venue for a conference, convention or business gathering.
Companies that reserve the Omaha hotel's meeting rooms prior to Dec. 31, 2015 for a professional event in the first quarter of 2016 will receive special rewards that will positively affect the business's bottom line. Take advantage of this special hotel deal to receive:
10% discount on audiovisual equipment 1 complimentary room per 40 rooms utilized, calculated cumulatively Double Marriott Reward points up to 100,000 One upgrade to platinum status for a year Two suite upgrades at the group rate along with a welcome amenity Group welcome amenity Perks will be based on the number of rooms booked with 20 to 50 rooms allowing the choice of one incentive, 51 to 100 rooms yielding two incentives, 101 to 150 rooms providing three incentives and 151 or more rooms offering four incentives.
With 12,000 square feet of elegant meeting space , Omaha Marriott can accommodate up to 400 banquet attendees, 500 reception guests or 600 people in a theater-style setup. From boardrooms to ballrooms, spaces can be customized to fit the style, size and budget of any group. All meeting rooms feature complimentary high-speed Internet access as well as a wide selection of audiovisual equipment, allowing speakers to present with ease. Professionals will be able to copy, fax and print at the hotel's full-service business center, and planners can work with an experienced event team to build a custom menu for meals or meeting breaks.
After a full day of strategic planning sessions or informative lectures, attendees can return to cozy and spacious guest rooms with a full range of modern amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access. Sink into plush bedding while watching premium cable channels, and keep snacks and beverages cold in convenient mini refrigerators in every room. Business travelers can work from the privacy of their room with the help of large desks paired with ergonomic chairs. Floor-to-ceiling windows offer natural lighting and views of the surrounding area for inspiration.
The hotel offers dining at Heartwood Restaurant & Lounge , open daily for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Serving mouthwatering cuisine at affordable prices, event attendees are sure to appreciate the chance to dine in a relaxed atmosphere after a taxing day. From starters, soups and salads to cherished dishes including the cedar plank salmon and black walnut filet, diners have the opportunity to choose from a wide selection of meals throughout the day when not being served at their event.
For information about this business deal or to book spaces now, contact Kristine Sudyka , director of sales and marketing, at 1-402-516-3620 or kristine.sudyka@marriott.com .
About Omaha Marriott
Omaha Marriott at 10220 Regency Circle in Omaha, NE is near CenturyLink Center Omaha, TD Ameritrade Park and the city's Old Market district. The hotel has 6 floors with 300 guest rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi as well as 14 meeting rooms totaling 12,000 square feet of space. Other highlights include an on-site restaurant, fitness center and indoor/outdoor pool. For information, visit www.marriott.com/OMAWE or call 1-402-399-9000. Like the hotel on Facebook , follow it on Twitter .
Join Marriott Rewards now and earn points that can be redeemed for free hotel stays and room upgrades at 3,800 hotels in over 70 countries.
Learn more about Marriott International Inc.
